sen.e: An Oten-mon Gate (応天門 or 應天門.) was located on the back side of the palace of Heijo-kyo Capital and another Oten-mon Gate on the back side of the palace of Heian-kyo Capital: The Oten-mon Gate consitituted the official gate to Chodoin (Hasshoin) where goverment operations and important ceremonies in the imperial court were executed.
